name: kater.ai
headline: Deliver complete data analysis from a single question
description:
1. You explain your problem.
2. Kater identifies the most important data questions to ask.
3. Kater writes the code.
4. You get insights in seconds rather than weeks.

Kater.ai flips the script on enterprise analytics by making every user an expert analyst. It uses a continuous classification engine to turn a single business question into a contextualized package of questions that is specific to your needs.

Kater puts the power of data into the hands of business experts while ensuring they use trusted data that is specific to their persona. No more waiting for data analysts. No more wasted time on analysis misfires and rework.

Yvonne was a data engineer and analyst who built the entire data stack at CREXi. Robin led engineering in Microsoft.  

Data is the new oil. Companies are data-rich, insight-poor. We're helping companies become insight-rich. This is the future of data.

founders.name: Yvonne Chou, Founder
founders.description: Yvonne is the co-founder and CEO of Kater. She graduated from UC Berkeley. Previously, she was a data engineer at Crexi, where she built the data infrastructure from the ground up. She has 8+ years of experience working in analytics teams for companies like Kaiser Permanente, Tapcart, and Crexi, where she supplied data to all dashboards for sales, marketing, finance, and executive management.

founders.name: Robin Seitz, Founder
founders.description: Robin is the co-founder and CTO of Kater. He graduated Magna Cum Laude from UCLA. Previously, he worked at companies such as Microsoft, Abbott and Paragon as a Software Engineer. He has 8+ years of experience working in different software engineering disciplines, including distributed systems, full stack engineering and big data.

# Data Storytelling,Reimagined
Automate answers to data questions, define next steps, and generate personalized weekly reports with actionable insights.
Backed by 
![logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66e01e1526610ef69497fd96_combinator-logo.svg)
How did sales performance improve last week?
Try It
Primary Objective
![search](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66e02c9dd37c9e4ab188630e_search.svg)
How did sales performance improve last week?
![response line](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66e02ed26621fcf834e6e9e7_response-lines.svg)
[Insight](https://www.kater.ai/<#>)
Analysis
Was there a recent marketing push geographically?
Insight
**Yes** , there was a marketing push for **Los Angeles, CA** last week through social media channels.
[Insight](https://www.kater.ai/<#>)
Analysis
Was there a change in visual layouts in the physical stores?
Insight
**No** , there were no changes made to layouts in physical stores last week.
[Insight](https://www.kater.ai/<#>)
Analysis
Did order value move?
Insight
**Yes** , order value **increased** by **4.3%** from last week to this week.
[Insight](https://www.kater.ai/<#>)
Analysis
Did units per transaction move?
Insight
**Yes** , UPT **increased** by **1.96%** from last week to this week.

Data Playbooks
UnifiedData Model
Query using plain English
Automated Reports
Does this sound familiar?
![mesh-gradient](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66e83409271adbbb0ed97b1f_mesh-gradient.svg)![svg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66fa6ab1e88ab0c7b9fde12e_estension-new.svg)
You know what is happening, but not how to interpret the data to drive actions.
Solved
![solved](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f5c12a16d20a889a091927_solved-svg.svg)
Stakeholders don't know what questions to ask based on their business objectives.
Solved
![solved](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f5c12a16d20a889a091927_solved-svg.svg)
You don’t have robust processes to build a unified semantic layer.
Solved
![solved](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f5c12a16d20a889a091927_solved-svg.svg)
You don't track and measure the decisions made because of your data.
Solved
![solved](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f5c12a16d20a889a091927_solved-svg.svg)
![star](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66d842e98484ac849eb0bbce_stars-clusters.svg)![star](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66d842e98484ac849eb0bbce_stars-clusters.svg)![image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66d83a6a8ed91b96fd23a6fd_hero-bg-lines.svg)
![star light](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f5dee67a32ffed3992a3c6_star-light.svg)![star effect](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f5dee692f148483d5c792a_star-effect.svg)
![star](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66d842e98484ac849eb0bbce_stars-clusters.svg)
Data Playbooks
Bridge the gap between data and decision making.
Pre-define what questions to ask and next steps to take based on data outcomes. After the playbook runs, receive automated report summaries to share with your team.
![Pause video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/67100fc54faa84026f8b1205_pause%20\(2\).png)![Play video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/6710104ccadf87edc723e0c8_play.png)
Butler AI
Ask questions about your personalized report in plain English.
Give anyone the power to answer and unblock their personal data requests, while being confident they're receiving the right answers.
![star](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66d842e98484ac849eb0bbce_stars-clusters.svg)![star](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66d842e98484ac849eb0bbce_stars-clusters.svg)
![Pause video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/67100fc54faa84026f8b1205_pause%20\(2\).png)![Play video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/6710104ccadf87edc723e0c8_play.png)
Data Models
Your unified semantic data model is built while you answer questions.
So you can focus on solving business problems without compromising on reusability & governance, and maintain software development best practices.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/670f5c3c88f4b57625852272_Group%20659.webp)
Confidence Ranks
Trust is non-negotiable. Total transparency.
Know exactly what sources power each insight, which tests are run, and a confidence ranking per response.
Can you confirm if 'Mountain Tire Sale' is the exact name of the promotion you are referring to?
[Confirm](https://www.kater.ai/<#>)
![svg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f7e8b731b9619c9a63f7ce_hotdog-1.svg)![svg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f7e8b731b9619c9a63f7d8_hotdog-2.svg)![svg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f7e8b792d54c5a946d1398_hotdog-3.svg)
![bubble](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f7e99b3967969f8cbadbe1_bubble-1.webp)![bubble](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f7e99b6a76b8022b289323_bubble-2.webp)
Security is our top priority.
Built to handle enterprise scale and with your privacy in mind. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/670f3669cabf0942be114548_SOC-2-Type-2.png)
SOC 2 Type 2 Compliant
Ensure your data is handled with the highest security standards. We are actively seeking SOC 2 Type 2 compliance, and this certification reflects our commitment to safeguarding your sensitive information.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/670f36daae436523a9916aa9_encrypted.png)
Encrypted In-Transit & At-Rest
Ensure that your data remains secure throughout its entire lifecycle. This robust encryption standard safeguards your data from unauthorized access, providing compliance with industry regulations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/670f37de6327d6ab7a315a0b_safe-box%20\(2\).png)
Credentials Stored Securely
Your credentials are stored securely using industry-standard encryption and a robust secrets manager, ensuring they remain fully protected from unauthorized access at all times.‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/670f387dfad2b4c413926192_key.png)
Label Columns as PII
Easily label columns as PII to ensure sensitive data is automatically identified and handled securely, maintaining privacy compliance throughout your workflows.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/670f38b065ae9dd2365a04e1_house.png)
Self-Hosted or Managed LLM
Use your own OpenAI API key, or use ours for convenience. Maintain control over your data while still benefiting from seamless, powerful AI integration for reliable insights.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/670f39092571b3866363bcc6_data-centralized.png)
Maintain Unified Governance
Centralize control over data access, privacy, and compliance, ensuring consistent security policies across your organization with a unified data model.
![Ilustration](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/6705232fbc84b7067f8727aa_Frame%201410103899.png)
![svg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66faa4a6e2af57922d5b0e03_box-lower.svg)
What is the AgentMesh?
We’ve built an orchestrated group of AI agents who work together to create a composite analysis, evaluating each other’s work, running calculations under the hood, and providing state-of-the-art accuracy in data analysis.
![image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f8006c6da5094bf6f7dda3_molecule.webp)
Code Evaluator
![svg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f80102bb0f45ece8e587da_molecule-line-1.svg)
Semantic Retrieval
![svg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f802863a9e770b0c2730b0_molecule-line-2.svg)
![svg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f8010279f6a633f44d579e_molecule-line-3.svg)
Proprietary Ranking System
![svg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f8047e88e0c04d437d4035_molecule-svg.svg)![svg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f8047eb089ad133b3bf92a_molecule-line-svg.svg)
Single AI Agent
Sole purpose is to perform one component of the workflow to the best of its ability.
![star](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66d842e98484ac849eb0bbce_stars-clusters.svg)![star](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66d842e98484ac849eb0bbce_stars-clusters.svg)![star](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66d842e98484ac849eb0bbce_stars-clusters.svg)![star](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66d842e98484ac849eb0bbce_stars-clusters.svg)![star](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66d842e98484ac849eb0bbce_stars-clusters.svg)![star](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66d842e98484ac849eb0bbce_stars-clusters.svg)
The New Age of Data Exploration is Here
![svg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66faa5d844eefcc0ffbefc14_bottom-lines.svg)![mesh-gradient](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66e83409271adbbb0ed97b1f_mesh-gradient.svg)
Data accessibility problems?
Solved
![solved](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f5c12a16d20a889a091927_solved-svg.svg)
Anyone can ask personalized follow-up data questions in plain English. Give users the power to unblock their data requests.
Semantic layer?
Solved
![solved](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f5c12a16d20a889a091927_solved-svg.svg)
As your data team answers questions, Kater automatically builds a shared data model which serves as the source of truth.
Reactive analytics?
Solved
![solved](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f5c12a16d20a889a091927_solved-svg.svg)
More than just _what_ is happening, enable everyday users to find _why_ outcomes occur, and outline what decisions they should make.
Is data a cost center?
Solved
![solved](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f5c12a16d20a889a091927_solved-svg.svg)
Accelerate your problem-to-impact workflow and enable a proactive, decision-driven analytics culture in your company.
Effortlessly Set Up in 15 Minutes
Ready to change the way your company interacts with data?
[Try for Free![arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f81b66adb0e64df82224d1_white-arrow.svg)](https://www.kater.ai/<#>)
![svg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f81c80473994404933ef98_eclipse-1.svg)![svg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f81c8037a88258414f9152_eclipse-2.svg)![svg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f81c8023083d966733a060_eclipse-3.svg)![svg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f81c80daad5c56e62d6818_eclipse-4.svg)![svg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f81c8121f12be128455d92_eclipse-5.svg)![svg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f81c8001ff42e8f4204bad_eclipse-6.svg)
Who is Kater for?
Kater is built for data professionals and data inquisitors. As your data team answers questions through playbooks, Kater automatically builds a shared **data model** which serves as the source of truth for your business metrics and semantics. This data model is version-controlled and follows SWE best practices. The data model enables business experts to ask personalized follow-up questions from the playbooks using plain English. Give anyone the power to answer and unblock their personal data requests.
How much does Kater cost?
We support free trials, with annual contracts determined by the size and complexity of your data and company. Contact us for more details.
What data warehouses do you integrate with?
You can connect with Snowflake, BigQuery, Databricks, Redshift, and MS-SQL. If you have a warehouse not on this list, we can build a custom connector for you in ~1 day.
How long does it take to set up?
Set up takes as quick as 15 minutes, and we provide white-glove onboarding and concierge services. We've meticulously designed Kater to be interoperable with your existing data stack and extremely simple to onboard, so you can start seeing value immediately.
How will Kater use my data?
We take data privacy very seriously. Kater does not store any of your data in our application database, nor do we use your data to train any LLM. Everything is stored locally in your browser's cache. 
Does Kater use AI to write SQL?
Kater only uses AI to help your data members write SQL as they build the Playbooks, ensuring that a human is still in the loop. Kater does **not** use AI to write SQL for non-technical users; it uses the defined YAML data model files instead. This ensures the highest accuracy in SQL results, as we found that using GenAI to generate SQL is not sufficient for business critical functions.
I have more questions. Who can I talk to?
More information can be found in our [documentation portal](https://www.kater.ai/<https:/docs.kater.ai/docs/guides>). If you'd like to chat with one of our customer experts, [book a quick 25 minute demo](https://www.kater.ai/<https:/calendly.com/kater-yvonne/kater-demo>) with us, or reach out to us at support@kater.ai.
[![logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/66f8252930eb7fe2c226afa6_footer-logo.svg)](https://www.kater.ai/</>)

Data Playbooks

Security is our top priority.
Built to handle enterprise scale and with your privacy in mind. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/670f3669cabf0942be114548_SOC-2-Type-2.png)
SOC 2 Type 2 Compliant
Ensure your data is handled with the highest security standards. We are actively seeking SOC 2 Type 2 compliance, and this certification reflects our commitment to safeguarding your sensitive information.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/670f36daae436523a9916aa9_encrypted.png)
Encrypted In-Transit & At-Rest
Ensure that your data remains secure throughout its entire lifecycle. This robust encryption standard safeguards your data from unauthorized access, providing compliance with industry regulations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/670f37de6327d6ab7a315a0b_safe-box%20\(2\).png)
Credentials Stored Securely
Your credentials are stored securely using industry-standard encryption and a robust secrets manager, ensuring they remain fully protected from unauthorized access at all times.‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/670f387dfad2b4c413926192_key.png)
Label Columns as PII
Easily label columns as PII to ensure sensitive data is automatically identified and handled securely, maintaining privacy compliance throughout your workflows.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/670f38b065ae9dd2365a04e1_house.png)
Self-Hosted or Managed LLM
Use your own OpenAI API key, or use ours for convenience. Maintain control over your data while still benefiting from seamless, powerful AI integration for reliable insights.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d8248aa9f88b0e385d331b/670f39092571b3866363bcc6_data-centralized.png)
Maintain Unified Governance
Centralize control over data access, privacy, and compliance, ensuring consistent security policies across your organization with a unified data model.
![Ilustration⟨33⟩]
![svg⟨34⟩]
What is the AgentMesh?
We’ve built an orchestrated group of AI agents who work together to create a composite analysis, evaluating each other’s work, running calculations under the hood, and providing state-of-the-art accuracy in data analysis.

![svg⟨41⟩]![mesh-gradient⟨21⟩]
Data accessibility problems?
Solved
![solved⟨23⟩]

Semantic layer?
Solved
![solved⟨23⟩]

Reactive analytics?
Solved
![solved⟨23⟩]
More than just _what_ is happening, enable everyday users to find _why_ outcomes occur, and outline what decisions they should make.
Is data a cost center?
Solved
![solved⟨23⟩]
Accelerate your problem-to-impact workflow and enable a proactive, decision-driven analytics culture in your company.
Effortlessly Set Up in 15 Minutes
Ready to change the way your company interacts with data?
Try for Free![arrow⟨42⟩](https://www.kater.ai/<#>)
![svg⟨43⟩]![svg⟨44⟩]![svg⟨45⟩]![svg⟨46⟩]![svg⟨47⟩]![svg⟨48⟩]
Who is Kater for?
Kater is built for data professionals and data inquisitors. As your data team answers questions through playbooks, Kater automatically builds a shared **data model** which serves as the source of truth for your business metrics and semantics. This data model is version-controlled and follows SWE best practices. The data model enables business experts to ask personalized follow-up questions from the playbooks using plain English. Give anyone the power to answer and unblock their personal data requests.
How much does Kater cost?
We support free trials, with annual contracts determined by the size and complexity of your data and company. Contact us for more details.
What data warehouses do you integrate with?
You can connect with Snowflake, BigQuery, Databricks, Redshift, and MS-SQL. If you have a warehouse not on this list, we can build a custom connector for you in ~1 day.
How long does it take to set up?
Set up takes as quick as 15 minutes, and we provide white-glove onboarding and concierge services. We've meticulously designed Kater to be interoperable with your existing data stack and extremely simple to onboard, so you can start seeing value immediately.
How will Kater use my data?
We take data privacy very seriously. Kater does not store any of your data in our application database, nor do we use your data to train any LLM. Everything is stored locally in your browser's cache. 
Does Kater use AI to write SQL?
Kater only uses AI to help your data members write SQL as they build the Playbooks, ensuring that a human is still in the loop. Kater does **not** use AI to write SQL for non-technical users; it uses the defined YAML data model files instead. This ensures the highest accuracy in SQL results, as we found that using GenAI to generate SQL is not sufficient for business critical functions.
I have more questions. Who can I talk to?
More information can be found in our documentation portal⟨3⟩. If you'd like to chat with one of our customer experts, book a quick 25 minute demo⟨49⟩ with us, or reach out to us at support@kater.ai.

generated_description:
**Kater.ai: Simplifying Data Analysis for Everyone**

Kater.ai was founded in 2023 and is a promising newcomer in the world of data analytics, currently part of Y Combinator's Batch W24. Based in San Francisco, it aims to revolutionize how businesses approach data through a straightforward yet powerful mission: delivering complete data analysis from just a single question.

The process Kater.ai employs is quite innovative. It starts with users articulating their data-related issues. Then, Kater identifies the essential questions that need to be answered, generates the necessary code, and ultimately delivers insights in seconds instead of weeks. This is a game-changer in the often tedious and slow-moving realm of enterprise analytics.

Kater's unique selling point is its continuous classification engine, which transforms a user’s single inquiry into a customized series of questions tailored to their specific needs. This empowers users—especially those who may not be data scientists—to become expert analysts, leveraging trusted data relevant to their specific roles or personas. It effectively eliminates the bottleneck of relying on dedicated data analysts, reducing time spent on analysis misfires and rework.

The founding team boasts impressive credentials, with Yvonne, a former data engineer and analyst who built the entire data stack at CREXi, and Robin, who led engineering at Microsoft. Their collective expertise shapes Kater into a robust platform that helps organizations transition from being data-rich but insight-poor to insight-rich.

Kater also focuses on data storytelling, automating responses to data questions, outlining next steps, and generating weekly reports filled with actionable insights. Features like *Data Playbooks*, 'Butler AI', and a unified data model enable users to engage with data in a more conversational and instinctive way, further democratizing data access.

Security remains a top priority as well—the company is working towards SOC 2 Type 2 compliance and ensures data privacy through robust encryption protocols.

For those eager to explore the future of data, Kater.ai simplifies analytics, allowing teams to set it up in about 15 minutes and offering a free trial for potential customers. The platform integrates seamlessly with popular data warehouses like Snowflake, BigQuery, and Redshift, making it an attractive option for businesses looking to enhance their data-driven decision-making processes.

In summary, Kater.ai is not just another analytics tool; it's a transformative approach to how businesses interact with and derive insights from their data. If you’re ready to empower your team to tap into the potential of data easily and intuitively, Kater.ai could be your next big step. Check them out at [Kater.ai](https://www.kater.ai).
